modName: A small farm field and ore mine in Riverwood
summary: This mod adds a small farm field (including 12 planting soils) and ore mine in Riverwood As it is shown in that Screenshots. (Requires : Hearthfire DLC)
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a small farm field (including 12 planting soils) and ore mine in Riverwood As it is shown in that Screenshots.
the mine contains 3 iron, 3 corundum ore veins. (and the mine is larger than old version.) 
[size=2][u]Requires : Hearthfire(DLC)
[/u]
* 1.1 version contains 2 iron, 2 corubdum ore veins.
[/size]* First version(tiny farm in riverwood) contains only a farm field. (without ore mine.)

[size=3][b]! attention ![/b]
[/size][size=3][u]if you use this mod from a savegame, the soils cannot be activated. [/u]
[u]in this case, you should leave the cell and then go back to the farm.[u](enter any house first and leave there. then.. it's done.) [/u][/u]
[/size]

[size=2][b]Recomended mod (in screenshots)[/b] :
A Simple Shack - Riverwood by [b]AngryGlock[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61871/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61871/[/url][/size]
author: bhsch
